What can #Parents do to keep #Kids safe from #CoronaVirus in #School in #Florida, #Arizona #Texas & #Georgia?

- require report’g fr your #School
- demand #Schools protect your #Children w #UniversalMasking
- determine #Teachers’ #Vaccine status
